name: infinity-desktop
description: Infinity Desktop - Electron wrapper for infinity-frontend
author: Voxcity <contato@voxcity.com.br>

scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:frontend & sleep 3 && npm run dev
scripts.build:win: npm run build:frontend && npm run build && electron-builder --win --config
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:frontend && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --config
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:frontend && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --config
